import React, { useState } from "react"; import howToUseApp from "./API/howToUse"; export const AboutUs = () => { const [aboutData] = useState(howToUseApp); return ( <>
{/* ----------1section right side data ----------------*/}

How to use the app?

{aboutData.map((curElem) => { const {id,title,info} = curElem return (<>
{id}

{title}

{info}

) })}

avaible 24/7
